lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Audrey, of Forest Hills, New York, passed away on March 23rd. A quintessential New Yorker, she will be remembered for embracing life with her distinctive charm, sense of humor and enviable energy. Audrey was predeceased by her husband Sam Shapiro and survived by her children Stephen (Margaret), Susan (Bob) and Barbara, her grandchildren Cassel, Stephanie, Stephen, Matthew, Alison, Peter and Carolyn and six great-grandchildren. Services will be 12 noon on Sunday, March 27th at the Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels in Forest Hills, NY. Donations may be made to The Summit School, Jamaica Estates, NY. 1/3
